Package server

Class ServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.ServerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ServerController
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ServerController extends the superclass AbstractServer for implementing and overriding the functions for our server-client project (zli)

      • runComplaintsThread

        private void runComplaintsThread()
        runComplaintsThread runs a task for the thread that pull the complaints of the customer everyone minute and updates the status if 24 hours pssed to the notification center.

      • generateReports

        private void generateReports()
        Create reportsThread to check if it's the end of the month to generate the reports. If it's not the end of the month, the thread will sleep for one day and it will check again depending on the current day. else, it will generateReport and the thread will sleep another day.

      • genrateReportCommand

        public void genrateReportCommand​(java.util.Date currentDate)
        If it's the end of the month, it will insert into reports table the reports for each branch.
        Parameters:
        currentDate -

      • isGenerated

        private boolean isGenerated​(java.util.Date currentDate)
        The function will check if the server already generated the reports when it's the end of the month.
        Parameters:
        currentDate -
        Returns:
        true or false depeding if the reports are already generated.

      • clientConnected

        protected void clientConnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        If client is connected, it will update the tableview of clients in the server gui. If the client is disconnected and he connected again, it will only change the status to "Connected" in the tabelview.
        Overrides:
        clientConnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client -

      • clientDisconnected

        protected void clientDisconnected​(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Hook method called each time a client disconnects. The default implementation does nothing. The method may be overridden by subclasses but should remains synchronized.
        Overrides:
        clientDisconnected in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection with the client.

      • disconnectAllClients

        private void disconnectAllClients()
